data.name: Nexty
data.technologies: GraphQL · Tailwind CSS · Next.js · TypeScript · React.js

data.name: Gutter Service
data.description: The Local company website offering gutter service

data.name: Boolebots
data.description: This is a group project made during Chingu Voayge. Boolebots aims to make learning boolean logic fun and engaging by allowing players to configure a series of bots and pit them against each other in battles.

data.name: Event Planner Application
data.description: Full stack MERN app with authentication and database hosted on MongoDB Atlas
data.technologies: Backend: Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript, Mongoose, Frontend: React, React Router, TypeScript, Styled Components

data.name: Winter Swimming Blog
data.description: Winter swimming blog built with Next.js, Contentful as a Headless CMS, and styled using Tailwind CSS. The blog is integrated with Disqus, enabling users to leave comments on posts. Additionally, it features an emotion-based reaction system, allowing visitors to express if they enjoyed the content with a simple click. This combination of modern tools ensures a seamless, interactive user experience.
data.technologies: React, Next, Contentful as a headless content management system, Tailwind CSS

data.name: Easybank
data.description: This is a solution to the Easybank landing page challenge from Frontend Mentor, a platform that helps developers improve their coding skills by working on real-world projects. This particular challenge tests layout abilities by requiring the development of a landing page that accurately replicates the given design.

data.name: Manage Landing Page
data.description: This is a solution to the Easybank landing page challenge from Frontend Mentor, a platform that helps developers improve their coding skills by working on real-world projects. This particular challenge tests responsive skills. There are lots of small details and slight content shifts for different screen sizes.

data.name: Photo Search Application
data.description: This is a React-based image search application that utilizes the Unsplash API. It empowers users to discover inspirational images, browse search results, and access additional details about their chosen images.

data.name: Hangman
data.description: Hangman is a game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project features an interactive user interface where players guess letters to complete a hidden word. Implemented game logic, including tracking player progress, and visual feedback for correct and incorrect guesses. The game is fully responsive and can be played across different devices.
